None.Name: Cannon Turrets
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, 8 turrets deal 52 damage each to enemies in 5m radius, up to 75 in total.

None.Name: Bombardment
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, fortress fires a mortar shell that deals 180 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 265 in total. Knocks back small and medium units.
